mapper.insert: insert eventCreditRules (id, name, credit,eventTypeId,seriesId,rank, createdTime, lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{name},#{credit},#{eventTypeId},#{seriesId},#{rank},now(),now())
mapper.update: update eventCreditRules set name=#{name}, credit=#{credit}, eventTypeId=#{eventTypeId}, seriesId=#{seriesId}, rank=#{rank} where id = #{id};
